attributes.action: Bring forward the referendum and get Britain out of the European Union!
attributes.additional_details:
The only country benefiting from the European Union is Germany. Which stands to sense considering they are the only ones who don't have a nationalist party on the uprise like us and France. 

Even though Mr.Cameron has heroically allowed thousands upon thousands of "Refugees" into this country who have done nothing but toss their Temporary passport into the sea as soon as they get here. And have NO means of returning. 

We JUST CAN'T ALLOW ANYMORE! MR.CAMERON WE ARE FULL
and its US that suffer!!
attributes.background: After the recent attacks in Paris and the ongoing attacks in the east we as English/British Citizens need to be assured of our safety. And not have it so even walking to the shops should have to be contemplated.
